about.title: About
about.description1: My name is Jefferson Santos and I am a technology enthusiast who decided to pursue a career in programming. Over the last four years, I have dedicated myself to understanding the main technologies on the market and applying agile development methodologies (I’m a coffee lover).
about.description2: I completed a technical course in Systems Development (DS) with a focus on Full Stack development. Since then, I have worked on projects as a freelancer and contributed to open source projects, continually improving my skills and experience in the field.

skills.title: Skills
skills.defaultText: * Hover over skills to learn more * en-us
skills.textNodejs: I chose Node.js because it allows me to create scalable and fast applications that can handle many requests at the same time without losing performance. I enjoy exploring the power of JavaScript on the backend and its frameworks to develop modern, solid solutions that truly make a difference.
skills.textExpress: Express.js is my go-to framework for creating robust and scalable RESTful APIs, providing a flexible and modular structure to handle requests and responses efficiently.
skills.textNestjs: I am passionate about learning and mastering Nest.js, a framework that promises to revolutionize the way I develop robust and scalable server-side applications, with a modular architecture and integration with TypeScript.
skills.textReact: With the powerful React library, I develop dynamic and reactive interfaces, creating fluid and interactive user experiences with JavaScript and TypeScript, always prioritizing performance and scalability.
skills.textNextJs: With Next.js, I create truly exceptional server-side rendering (SSR) and static site generation (SSG) web applications, ensuring impeccable speed, SEO, and user experience.
skills.textSass: Sass is my tool of choice for creating more efficient and modular CSS styles, leveraging the ability to use variables, mixins, and functions to create a personalized and responsive user experience.
skills.textFlutter: Currently, I study and apply Flutter in the development of cross-platform mobile applications, creating personalized interfaces and high-quality, fluid user experiences.
skills.textJava: Java is my first love; with it, I create 'Topzadas' applications that meet the most complex needs, leveraging the ability to handle large volumes of data and ensure data integrity and availability.
skills.textPostgres: Postgres is my database of choice, and with Neon, I can efficiently provision and manage serverless databases, ensuring data integrity and availability.
skills.textMySQL: With MySQL, I store and manage large volumes of data efficiently and scalably, ensuring data integrity and availability.
skills.textGit: Git and GitHub are my go-to tools for managing code versioning and collaborating with other developers, ensuring code integrity and traceability.
skills.textDocker: With Docker, I can containerize applications and ensure consistency and portability across different environments, simplifying the development, testing, and deployment process, and ensuring scalability and reliability.
